title: Positivity Pack – Gratitude & Wins Log
goal: Encourage short daily reflections to build positive thinking habits.
why_it_matters: Gratitude journaling increases resilience and overall mood.
workflow: Student adds short “Today I’m grateful for…” entry.
AI groups entries into weekly themes (“Support”, “Progress”).
Weekly reflection summary highlights top 3 mood drivers.
outcome: Elegant UX project showing emotional-design principles.
